timeline.raw_data: {"type": "email", "timestamp": "2025-07-22T03:00:47", "sender_email": "echo.tian@amberstudent.com", "recipient_email": "imaginaryconstant@gmail.com", "subject": "Contact request from amberstudent", "message": "Hi Hei Chan\\n\\n\u6211\u662f\u4f86\u81eaamber student\u7684\u54a8\u8be2\u987e\u95eeEcho\uff0c\u6536\u5230\u4f60\u7684\u4f26\u6566\u79df\u623f\u54a8\u8be2\uff0c\u521aWhatsApp\u4e0e\u4f60\u8054\u7cfb\u672a\u56de\u590d\uff0c\u5982\u679c\u65b9\u4fbf\u53ef\u4ee5\u6dfb\u52a0\u6211\u7684\u4f01\u4e1a\u5fae\u4fe1\uff0c\u6216\u8005\u4e0e\u6211WhatsApp\u8054\u7cfb\u4ee5\u4fbf\u4e3a\u4f60\u66f4\u597d\u7684\u63d0\u4f9b\u627e\u623f\u9810\u5b9a\u670d\u52a1\u3002\\n\\nWeChat\uff1a13032320906\\nWhatsApp\uff1a8615111461586\\n\\n\u671f\u5f85\u4f60\u7684\u56de\u8986\u3002\\nEcho\\n\\necho tian\\n\\nOperations Consultant\\n\\nPhone: +8613032320906\\n\\nEmail: [echo.tian@amberstudent.com]()\\n\\nWebsite: [amberstudent.com]()", "snippet": "Hi Hei Chan \u6211\u662f\u4f86\u81eaamber student\u7684\u54a8\u8be2\u987e\u95eeEcho\uff0c\u6536\u5230\u4f60\u7684\u4f26\u6566\u79df\u623f\u54a8\u8be2\uff0c\u521aWhatsApp\u4e0e\u4f60\u8054\u7cfb\u672a\u56de\u590d\uff0c\u5982\u679c\u65b9\u4fbf\u53ef\u4ee5\u6dfb\u52a0\u6211\u7684\u4f01\u4e1a\u5fae\u4fe1\uff0c\u6216\u8005\u4e0e\u6211WhatsApp\u8054\u7cfb\u4ee5\u4fbf\u4e3a\u4f60\u66f4\u597d\u7684\u63d0\u4f9b\u627e\u623f\u9810\u5b9a\u670d\u52a1\u3002 WeChat\uff1a13032320906 WhatsApp\uff1a8615111461586 \u671f\u5f85\u4f60\u7684\u56de\u8986\u3002 Echo echo tian Operations Consultant", "direction": "outbound", "sender_type": "agent", "agent_email": "echo.tian@amberstudent.com", "student_email": "imaginaryconstant@gmail.com"}

transcripts.transcript_text:
Speaker A: Oh, hello. Hello. Yeah, I can hear you. I can hear you.
Speaker B: Okay, I'm sorry.
Speaker A: I just want to say Public health studied students.
Speaker B: That one, yes. Amber student dot com.
Speaker A: Oh, you're the United Students one, Right.
Speaker B: Sorry. Could you please say it again?
Speaker A: Are you from the United Students Town or Amber House?
Speaker B: Amber House, yes.
Speaker A: Oh, that one. I need some time to check the Amber House because There was a WhatsApp, but there was no context of.
Speaker B: Yes, I have contact you WhatsApp. I. I didn't receive any reply, so I, I just tried to kill you to ask if you. If you still have the requirement.
Speaker A: Okay, let me, let me take a check. Amber Housers.
Speaker B: Yeah, I have just WhatsApp you on Monday or Tuesday. I. I didn't.
Speaker A: All right. Yeah, I saw there wasn't any contact, so I don't know if that was a real number.
Speaker B: It's my number. You can. We can contact in WhatsApp. If you have any questions, you can send message to me. I'll check the room availability to you.
Speaker A: Thanks.
Speaker B: Okay, so that's all we can. Okay, goodbye. Thank you.
